thread.title: Arxis Technology Recognized with a 2015 Intacct Momentum Partner of the Year Award
thread.title_full: Arxis Technology Recognized with a 2015 Intacct Momentum Partner of the Year Award

author: Arxis Technology
title: Arxis Technology Recognized with a 2015 Intacct Momentum Partner of the Year Award
text:
For Immediate Release: Arxis Technology, Inc., a technology consulting firm specializing in the implementation and support of Intacct Cloud Financials, announced today it was named a 2015 Intacct Momentum Partner of the Year for “record growth in Intacct license revenue while maintaining superior customer satisfaction.” This is the first year Intacct has awarded this distinction.
Intacct recognized six partners with Partner of the Year accolades from their network of more than 350 firms who deliver comprehensive, high quality services, support, and software to help companies get maximum value from their Intacct investment.
“Arxis Technology was one of the first Intacct partners to really embrace best-in-class cloud solutions, and they continue to deliver as a premier Intacct partner,” said Taylor Macdonald, vice president of Channel for Intacct. “When you combine their proven implementation methodology and deep industry expertise, you can count on Arxis every time. David Cieslak and Bob Gaby have a great team and I congratulate Arxis on this achievement and look forward to continuing our momentum as we accelerate our rapid growth together.”
“Our first priority will always be helping our clients be successful. This Momentum Partner of the Year Award is proof that we can strategically grow as a company while providing a customer experience that remains delightful and impactful,” said David Cieslak, CPA/CITP and Arxis Principal.
Arxis Technology was recently named to the 2015 Intacct President’s Club as well. This is the third time Arxis has been invited to join Intacct’s elite group of partners who are the highest-performing Value-Added Resellers (VARs) delivering high-quality implementation, service, and support to help companies maximize their Intacct investment.
“It’s really rewarding to watch the faces of our clients when they see Intacct working in their business the first time. Some have actually called it ‘magic!’ That’s when we know we’ve done our job well. When their eyes light up and you hear about how much time they are going to save, and how well their implementation went, that’s very gratifying. These two recent awards from Intacct really validate that we’re on the right track,” said Bob Gaby, CPA/CITP and Arxis Principal.
Intacct’s robust solution has enabled Arxis to transform the way Entertainment companies, Software & SaaS providers, and Professional Services organizations manage their complex financial needs to help save time and money. “Over and over, we hear from our clients that Intacct helped them achieve automation they didn’t dream was possible,” Gaby added.
About Arxis Technology, Inc.
Arxis Technology, Inc. is a technology consulting firm specializing in the implementation and support of accounting and business management software, custom application development, and network engineering and design. As value-added resellers and consultants for Intacct Cloud Financials, Adaptive Insights, Sage 100 (formerly MAS 90), Sage 300 (formerly Accpac), Sage 500 (formerly MAS 500), and SageCRM, Arxis supports clients from locations in Los Angeles, Orange County, Phoenix, Washington, DC, Philadelphia, Baltimore, and Ireland.
For more information about Arxis, visit http://www.arxistechnology.com , or call (866) 624-2600.
About Intacct
Intacct is a leading provider of best-in-class cloud ERP software. Bringing cloud computing to finance and accounting, Intacct’s award-winning applications are the preferred financial applications for AICPA business solutions. In use by more than 9,000 organizations from startups to public companies, Intacct is designed to improve company performance and make finance more productive. Hundreds of leading CPA firms and Value Added Resellers also offer Intacct to their clients. The Intacct system includes accounting, cash management, purchasing, vendor management, financial consolidation, revenue recognition, project accounting, fund accounting, inventory management, and financial reporting applications, all delivered over the Internet via cloud computing. Intacct is headquartered in San Jose, California. For more information, please visit http://us.intacct.com/?referral=Arxis .
